channel.title: Brandon Boswell
channel.description: Recent content from Brandon Boswell's Digital Garden

item.title: Out of sight, out of mind
item.description: This is an old adage that my dad used to say to me when I would stay with him on some weekends. He would have friends over, and they would be doing their own thing, and they used to tell me and my friends that you could stay up later if we stayed “out of sight out of mind.” I’m not sure how I feel about this as a parenting strategy, but it makes a lot of sense when dealing with what you should focus on and what you need to steer clear of from a distraction perspective.
item.content:encoded: This is an old adage that my dad used to say to me when I would stay with him on some weekends. He would have friends over, and they would be doing their own thing, and they used to tell me and my friends that you could stay up later if we stayed “out of sight out of mind.” I’m not sure how I feel about this as a parenting strategy, but it makes a lot of sense when dealing with what you should focus on and what you need to steer clear of from a distraction perspective.

item.title: Someday Backlog
item.description: A place for your tasks that lack urgency. These are things that you could ignore for a few weeks or months and everything would be okay. It doesn’t mean that they’re not important (they are often strategic in nature), they’re just not for right now. Meta Task Management
item.content:encoded:
A place for your tasks that lack urgency. These are things that you could ignore for a few weeks or months and everything would be okay. It doesn’t mean that they’re not important (they are often strategic in nature), they’re just not for right now.

Meta

Task Management

item.title: Smartphones
item.description: I currently use an iPhone 15 Pro. It’s good, but not perfect. Here are a few things I feel strongly about with regard to Smartphones. Phones should be useable with one hand Disable Phone Notifications Avoid your phone for the first hour of the day
item.content:encoded:
I currently use an iPhone 15 Pro. It’s good, but not perfect. Here are a few things I feel strongly about with regard to Smartphones.

  • Phones should be useable with one hand
  • Disable Phone Notifications
  • Avoid your phone for the first hour of the day

item.title: Networking
item.description: Maintain a mix of Quality and Quantity. Nurture your existing connections that you would like to maintain and grow. Review Your Goals: What were your networking goals for the past year? Were they specific, measurable, and achievable? Assess Your Network: Who are the key individuals in your network that have positively impacted your life or career? Did you establish new connections that align with your goals? Evaluate Networking Strategies: What strategies did you use to expand and nurture your network? Did you attend events, join online communities, or use social media effectively? Quality vs. Quantity: Did you focus on building deep connections with a few key individuals, or did you prioritize casting a wider net?
item.content:encoded:
Maintain a mix of Quality and Quantity. Nurture your existing connections that you would like to maintain and grow.

  1. Review Your Goals:

    • What were your networking goals for the past year?
    • Were they specific, measurable, and achievable?

  2. Assess Your Network:

    • Who are the key individuals in your network that have positively impacted your life or career?
    • Did you establish new connections that align with your goals?

  3. Evaluate Networking Strategies:

    • What strategies did you use to expand and nurture your network?
    • Did you attend events, join online communities, or use social media effectively?

  4. Quality vs. Quantity:

    • Did you focus on building deep connections with a few key individuals, or did you prioritize casting a wider net?
    • Were you able to strike a balance between quality and quantity in your network?

  5. Follow-up and Relationship Maintenance:

    • How consistent were you in following up with your network connections?
    • Did you actively engage with them beyond initial meetings or interactions?

  6. Learning and Growth:

    • Reflect on the insights and knowledge gained through your network.
    • How did your network contribute to your personal and professional growth?

  7. Identify Challenges:

    • Were there any challenges or obstacles in your networking efforts?
    • How can you overcome these challenges in the future?

  8. Feedback and Improvement:

    • Seek feedback from your network on your interactions.
    • In what areas do you think you could improve your networking skills?

  9. Set New Networking Goals:

    • Based on your reflections, what are your networking goals for the upcoming year?
    • How can you enhance your networking strategies for better results?

  10. Integration with Core Values:

    • How does your networking align with your core values and long-term objectives?
    • Are there adjustments needed to ensure your network supports your overall life priorities?

Remember, the goal is not just to have a large network but to have a network that adds value to your life and aligns with your aspirations. Feel free to share your thoughts on any of these points, and we can explore further or discuss specific areas in more detail.

item.title: Weekly Reflection
item.description: Doing a weekly reset, reflection, and setting a key goal for the week is like establishing an implementation intention for the important aspects of your life. They create an intention to dedicate yourself to specific actions. By doing so, you increase the likelihood of accomplishing meaningful work, rather than constantly reacting to whatever comes your way. It’s much easier to respond to immediate demands, instead of prioritizing what truly matters (and propels you forward). When you’re constantly reacting, you relinquish control over your future, which can be quite unsettling.
item.content:encoded: Doing a weekly reset, reflection, and setting a key goal for the week is like establishing an implementation intention for the important aspects of your life. They create an intention to dedicate yourself to specific actions. By doing so, you increase the likelihood of accomplishing meaningful work, rather than constantly reacting to whatever comes your way. It’s much easier to respond to immediate demands, instead of prioritizing what truly matters (and propels you forward). When you’re constantly reacting, you relinquish control over your future, which can be quite unsettling.

item.title: Image Diffing
item.description: Learned how to do an image diff with ImageMagick. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5132749/diff-an-image-using-imagemagick Get the differences in Red compare image1 image2 -compose src diff.png Flicker Compare convert -delay 50 ~/Downloads/1.png ~/Downloads/updated.png -loop 0 ~/Downloads/flicker.gif
item.content:encoded:
Learned how to do an image diff with ImageMagick. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5132749/diff-an-image-using-imagemagick

Get the differences in Red

compare image1 image2 -compose src diff.png

Flicker Compare

convert -delay 50 ~/Downloads/1.png ~/Downloads/updated.png -loop 0 ~/Downloads/flicker.gif

item.title: A second turntable
item.description: A few years back, I picked up an Audio Technica AT-LP60X as an extremely low-cost introduction into Turntables. It’s not good, but I wasn’t expecting it to be. We’ve picked up a handful of records and are looking to have a more enjoyable experience with it. So I’m going down the research rabbit-hole of what to replace it with. Original Picks Pro-ject Debut Carbon Evo Current Running Fluance RT-85 Rega P3 Technics SL1200 Purchased I was able to find a used Pro-ject Debut Carbon (non-evo) with some upgrades for $350. So far I’m really enjoying it, so I have no complaints recommending that turntable, especially at this price-point.
item.content:encoded:
A few years back, I picked up an Audio Technica AT-LP60X as an extremely low-cost introduction into Turntables. It’s not good, but I wasn’t expecting it to be. We’ve picked up a handful of records and are looking to have a more enjoyable experience with it. So I’m going down the research rabbit-hole of what to replace it with.

Original Picks

  • Pro-ject Debut Carbon Evo

Current Running

  • Fluance RT-85
  • Rega P3
  • Technics SL1200

Purchased

I was able to find a used Pro-ject Debut Carbon (non-evo) with some upgrades for $350. So far I’m really enjoying it, so I have no complaints recommending that turntable, especially at this price-point.

item.title: Less good can often be more relatable and authentic to others
Embeddings
item.description: Embeddings are, at their core, numerical representations of information — such as words, sentences, or images — mapped into a continuous vector space. In other words, they translate data into a language that machines can understand and process efficiently. Meta AI Machine Learning Semantic Analysis
item.content:encoded:
Embeddings are, at their core, numerical representations of information — such as words, sentences, or images — mapped into a continuous vector space. In other words, they translate data into a language that machines can understand and process efficiently.

Meta

  • AI
  • Machine Learning
  • Semantic Analysis

item.title: Great apps built on top of AI should help their users add framing to their prompts
item.description: With AI, almost anything is possible, and most users don’t know the best way to frame their prompt. Designers and engineers have spent significant time with AI and are in a better position to recommend prompts to get users better results.
item.content:encoded: With AI, almost anything is possible, and most users don’t know the best way to frame their prompt. Designers and engineers have spent significant time with AI and are in a better position to recommend prompts to get users better results.

item.title: Vinyl
item.description: Tim Mullins mentioned a few things to look for in records: Look for things pre-1980 where everything was analog Live Jazz from this era is especially good There are specific labels to look for that typically produce good stuff: Older Blue Note He mentioned some others that I unfortunately can’t remember at the moment.
item.content:encoded:
Tim Mullins mentioned a few things to look for in records:

  • Look for things pre-1980 where everything was analog
  • Live Jazz from this era is especially good
  • There are specific labels to look for that typically produce good stuff:
    • Older Blue Note
    • He mentioned some others that I unfortunately can’t remember at the moment.

item.title: AI Prompts
item.description: Per Nielsen Norman Group, there are four components to a prompt: • Request • [Reference] to either previous bot answers or to external sources • Format • Framing However, I prefer Josh’s nomenclature for this: Examples Email Writing As a copywriter, please fix any grammar, spelling, syntax and punctuation errors in the {message} using british English dictionary only. Do this change the wording at all. You must keep the wording the same. If you encounter any ambiguity, please use your best judgment to determine the intended meaning. Return the corrected version of the {message} in british english, as shown in the example below.
item.content:encoded:
Per Nielsen Norman Group, there are four components to a prompt: • Request • [Reference] to either previous bot answers or to external sources • Format • Framing

However, I prefer Josh’s nomenclature for this:

Examples

Email Writing

  • As a copywriter, please fix any grammar, spelling, syntax and punctuation errors in the {message} using british English dictionary only. Do this change the wording at all. You must keep the wording the same. If you encounter any ambiguity, please use your best judgment to determine the intended meaning. Return the corrected version of the {message} in british english, as shown in the example below. Do not include prefix nor explanation, just fixed text. ###{message}.

Transcription

  • Please refine the transcription of my voice recording for clarity, legibility, and grammatical accuracy. Ensure that all content remains unaltered in meaning or substance. You may correct spelling, rectify sentence structure, and adjust word order where necessary to improve readability. It is essential to retain my original language style without adding or omitting any information. The goal is to enhance the transcript, making it clearer and easier to understand without changing the intended message or losing any details. Thank you.

Reflection

You are an Al within a journaling app. Your job is to help the user reflect on their thoughts in a thoughtful and kind manner. The user can never directly address you or directly respond to you. Try not to repeat what the user said, instead try to seed new ideas, encourage or debate. Keep your responses concise, but meaningful.

Annual Planning (h/t Josh)

You are a productivity coach, you will help me align my life with what’s important to me while being a successful human. I am doing my annual review and you will give me advice and ask me questions that will help me reflect on the past year and prepare for the year ahead. I will ask you about a certain area of my life and I want you to present me with questions and points on reflection. Wait until I tell you what area of my life I want to focus on.
